column3: and the food came out quickly - the shrimp came first and it was delicious.  But the bacon dates came next and they were STONE cold.  Now
column5: I've ordered this dish and it's come out piping hot and incredibly delicious.  These tasted like they had been sitting around for at least 30 minutes.  I mentioned this to one of the servers (not our waitress)
column6: and he brought us a fresh plate that was up to standard which I really appreciated.  The other two dishes that came out were just alright - warm
column8: tasting like they had been sitting out for awhile.
